Authors:
Juliano Marcon Baltazar, Maria Belen Pildain, Sergio Perez
Gorjon, Rosa Mara Borges da Silveira, Mario Rajchenberg
Title:
Phylogenetic relationships of Hydnum peroxydatum support the
synonymy of Hydnochaete with Hymenochaete (Hymenochaetaceae,
Agaricomycetes)
Keywords:
Basidiomycota, corticioid fungi, Cyclomyces,
Hymenochaetales, ITS and LSU rDNA, xanthochroic fungi
Abstract:
A combined dataset of rDNA ITS and LSU sequences was used
to infer the phylogenetic relationships of Hydnochaete peroxydata (â¡
Hydnum peroxydatum), the type species of Hydnochaete. The species was
retrieved nested within the Hymenochaete s. str. clade; therefore
Hydnochaete is regarded as a synonym of Hymenochaete and the new
combination Hymenochaete peroxydata is proposed.
